short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Galxe Quest Assistant is a free Chrome extension designed specifically for the Galxe community

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Galxe Quest Assistant" is an unofficial, free Chrome extension developed by a member of the Galxe community, Alexkat. Formerly known as "Galxe Raffle Tracker," this upgraded tool is designed to enhance the user experience by tracking both raffle participations and quest activities for Galxe platform users. With seamless integration with Metamask, the extension offers a secure and efficient way to manage your raffle and quest interactions directly from your browser.

Features:

Metamask Integration: Quick, secure connection to your Galxe account.
Participation Tracking: Easily monitor your current raffle participations and quest activities.
Victory Notifications: Immediate alerts for new raffle wins.
Effortless User Interface: Intuitive design for hassle-free navigation.
How It Works:

Install from the Chrome Web Store.
Authorize with Metamask for a secure link to Galxe.
Track participations and quests with automatic updates.
Receive real-time notifications for every victory and new quest.
Perfect for active members of the Galxe platform, "Galxe Quest Assistant" simplifies your experience, ensuring you never miss out on a win or a quest opportunity.
